snippet: Operators of California ski resorts are gazing impatiently at the sky for storm clouds and checking their thermometers for cold weather. This weekend, slopes in the Sierra Mountains were better suited for mountain biking than winter sports.       ...
lead_paragraph: Operators of California ski resorts are gazing impatiently at the sky for storm clouds and checking their thermometers for cold weather. This weekend, slopes in the Sierra Mountains were better suited for mountain biking than winter sports. Warm temperatures and a dearth of natural snow have deflated the expectations of many skiers and resort operators; the last ski season was one of this state's longest.

headline.main: Scarce Snow Leaves California Skiers Longing for Last Season
